meanings.definition: The involuntary grinding or clenching of the teeth, typically during sleep.
meanings.sent1: Bruxism can cause tooth damage over time.
meanings.sent2: Dentists often recommend mouthguards for bruxism.
meanings.sent3: My sister's bruxism led to some interesting dental bills!
meanings.sent4: The sound of bruxism echoed through the quiet night.
meanings.sent5: The dentist showed me a graphic video about the effects of bruxism.

meanings.definition: A condition characterized by the grinding or clenching of teeth.
meanings.sent1: Severe bruxism may require specialized treatment.
meanings.sent2: Some people are unaware of their bruxism until told by others.
meanings.sent3: His bruxism was so loud, it woke up the neighbors!
meanings.sent4: The stress of the situation caused her bruxism to worsen.
meanings.sent5: The dentist explained the dangers of untreated bruxism.
